summary: Modifies the magic system to make magic stronger.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Overview

[/b]Have you ever felt weak while playing as a magic-oriented character? Running out of magicka without making serious damage to your opponent? Forced to heavily exploit the Enchant skill, and similar stuff? Do you want to change that?

Well, look no further. This mod makes magic stronger but (IMHO) not overpowered, so that your mage will be decently effective in combat without being omnipotent.

[b]
Detailed description

[/b]Precisely, this mod does the following simple things.

[list=1]
[*]Removes the penalization to the magicka regeneration rate due to combat. This means, during combat your character's magicka will regenerate as fast as outside combat.


[*]Modifies the perks labeled "Novice", "Apprentice", "Adept", "Expert", "Master" in each of the magic schools Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Illusion, Restoration as follows:

[list]
[*]for the schools of Alteration, Destruction, Illusion, Restoration: each perk decreases the casting cost by 50% AND increases the spell [u]magnitude[/u] by 50% for every spell matching the perk level;
[*]for the school of Conjuration: each perk decreases the casting cost by 50% AND increases the spell [u]duration[/u] by 50% for every spell matching the perk level.
[/list]
[*]The cost of dual casting a spell is reduced to 2 x (SPELL COST) from 2.8 x (SPELL COST) and magnitude is increased to 2.5 x (SPELL MAGNITUDE) from 2.2 x (SPELL MAGNITUDE).


[/list]
That's all, folks. ï»¿


[b]Requirements

[/b]Skyrim version 1.9.32.


[b]Installation

[/b]Just drop the .esp file in your Data directory and activate it in the Launcher.


[b]Uninstallation

[/b]Deactivate the .esp file in the Launcher and remove it from your Data directory.


Enjoy!
author: sgrunt137
